name: arnaud-rinquin-resume
description: My resume in `.json`. Exportable to `.html` and `.pdf`

scripts.pages: npm run pages:pull && npm run pages:compile && npm run pages:push
scripts.pages:pull: git checkout gh-pages && git pull --rebase origin master
scripts.pages:push: git add index.html && git commit -m 'Update pages' && git push -f origin gh-pages && git checkout -

author: Arnaud Rinquin
